name: 余盛延
objective:
本課程旨在發展學生獨立規劃及從事研究的能力，學生可在指導老師的指導下，依個別的需求選擇研究的方向，訂定題目，並獨立完成研究計畫，撰寫報告。
專題研究範圍含：
 實驗研究
 量調查研究或質調查研究
 個案研究
 回溯研究
 文化比較研究
 理論闡述研究
schedule:
Syllabus

09/15  Deciding a Topic

09/23  Deciding a Topic

09/29  Analyzing and Taking Notes on the Primary Text

10/06  Analyzing and Taking Notes on the Primary Text

10/13  Analyzing and Taking Notes on the Primary Text

10/20  Analyzing and Taking Notes on the Secondary Text

10/27  Analyzing and Taking Notes on the Secondary Text

11/03  Analyzing and Taking Notes on the Secondary Text

11/10  Writing the first Draft

11/17  Writing the first Draft

11/24  Writing the Second Draft

12/01  Writing the Second Draft

12/08  Writing the Third Draft

12/15  Writing the Third Draft

12/22 Submitting the manuscript

12/29  Preparing for Oral Defense

01/05  Preparing for Oral Defense

01/12  Oral Defense (DATE TBA)
scorePolicy:
Grading policy: 
Individual Conference: 20%
Timely submission of the project manuscript: 30%
Timely revision: 20%
Oral Defense: 30%

schedule:
Unit One: Using research resources
Week 1 Introduction
Week 2 Library Tour
Week 3 Database I
Week 4 Database II
Unit Two: Searching for target field
Week 5 Internet resources
Week 6 Choosing for desired fields
Week 7 Focusing on one field
Week 8 Locating several areas of interest
Unit Three: Choosing a topic
Week 9 Deciding on one area

scorePolicy:
